original_text: And he did that which was right in the sight of the Lord, according to all that his father Amaziah had done;
korean_text: 아사랴가 그의 아버지 아마샤의 모든 행위대로 여호와 보시기에 정직히 행하였으나

sentences.original_text: And he did that which was right
in the sight of the Lord,
according to all that his father Amaziah had done;
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 아버지 아마샤가 행한 모든 것대로 하였더라
